oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fourth Avenue North, downtown Nashville, circa 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of Fourth Avenue N, central business district, in downtown Nashville, circa 1960. Ross Hotel (pictured on left in background) is located at 140 4th Avenue North. The Ambrose Printing Company (162-66 4th Avenue N) and the Third National Bank Building (170 4th Avenue N) are pictured in the foreground. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 filmstrip negative : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ross Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.); Ambrose Printing Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Third National Bank (Nashville, Tenn.)
